mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review INNER JOIN user ON review.writer_id = user.id INNER JOIN movie ON review.movie_id = movie.id WHERE review.movie_id = #{id} ORDER BY review.id DESC
SELECT * FROM review INNER JOIN user ON review.writer_id = user.id WHERE review.movie_id = #{movieId} AND review.content IS NOT NULL AND content != '' ORDER BY review.entry_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM review INNER JOIN user ON review.writer_id = user.id INNER JOIN movie ON review.movie_id = movie.id WHERE review.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(content, writer_id, movie_id, score) VALUES (#{content}, #{writerId}, #{movieId}, #{score})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET score = #{score}, content = #{content}, modify_date= NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
